situation.title: School canteens
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for school canteens.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Governmental regulations do not allow the presence of the public in restaurants. The exception from this rule applies to canteens that are not intended for the public. This means that work canteens are allowed to operate.

If these canteens stay open it is necessary to follow all hygienic measures. A maximum of 4 people can sit at one table and they need to be at least 1,5 away from each other.

From November 18th, children attending the school can also eat in the canteen.
